name: 8-ball
title: 8 Ball
description: Returns an 8 ball like answer to questions
author: rocksack

commands.name: index
commands.title: 8ball
commands.subtitle: Random Answers
commands.description: Returns a random answer to questions

preferences.name: defaultAction
preferences.title: Default action on Enter
preferences.description: Choose what happens when you run the command

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
